description:
Welcome to BareBones Bartending.

We are the fastest, most up-to-date bartending program out there. We’ve turned absolute beginners to industry-ready in as few as 4 hours. How? By avoiding wasteful in-class explanations and instead offering a program that focuses on building real skills and practical experience. This is also what makes our program incredibly affordable.

Why choose BareBones?

Every bartender school before us had some variation of the same promise.

“Trust us.”

“We know what we’re doing.”

“We’ve been bartending for… years.”

They’re offering self-certified classes taught by current and former bartenders, so there’s no way of knowing if you’re getting current, useful or even correct information until after you’ve enrolled.

What did we do differently?

We brought in the Professionals.

-A Brand Ambassador from the world’s fastest growing Tequila company.
-A Brewer from “Canada’s Best Brewery” 3 years in a row.
-A Certified Sommelier.
-An Industry Leader in Tools of the Trade.

Basically the Bartender’s Dream Team.


No more excuses, Whether you’re trying to get your first job, looking to make a move to a better bar, or starting a new career, BareBones is the only smart way to go.  Let's get started.
title: BareBones Bartending: Become a Working Bartender!
